name: Storm Scooter Pro
description: High-speed electric scooter with a 60 km range and a sporty design.
longDescription: Storm Scooter Pro represents the evolution of urban mobility. With a high-efficiency electric motor and next-gen lithium battery, it delivers a smooth and quiet ride—perfect for city commuting with style and environmental responsibility.

name: Lightning Bike X1
description: Premium electric motorcycle with advanced technology and futuristic design.
longDescription: Lightning Bike X1 is our most advanced electric motorcycle—built for riders who want power, style, and sustainability. With cutting-edge tech and premium materials, it delivers an unmatched riding experience.

name: Urban Cruiser
description: Perfect for the city—elegant, efficient design for everyday use.
longDescription: Urban Cruiser is designed for modern city life. Its compact, stylish form makes it ideal for navigating city streets, while its energy efficiency ensures economical, eco-friendly transport.

name: Thunder Max
description: The most powerful in our lineup—built for enthusiasts and adventurers.
longDescription: Thunder Max is the culmination of our electric engineering. Made for those who won’t compromise on power, it offers a thrilling ride with the assurance of the latest electric technology.

name: City Rider
description: Ideal for daily urban commutes—affordable and reliable.
longDescription: City Rider is the perfect choice for those seeking accessible electric mobility without sacrificing quality. Great for students and professionals who need dependable daily transport.

name: Eco Sport
description: Eco-friendly sport design with smart technology and aerodynamic build.
longDescription: Eco Sport combines sporty performance with environmental responsibility. Its aerodynamic design and intelligent tech make it the perfect choice for eco-conscious riders.

name: JBL Flip Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound—great for indoors and outdoors.
longDescription: Compact, rugged, and ready to go. The JBL Flip delivers clear, punchy audio in a portable form factor. Perfect for daily use and weekend trips.

name: JBL GO Speaker
description: Ultra-portable Bluetooth speaker for music on the go.
longDescription: Small size, big sound. JBL GO is designed to travel light and play loud—your pocket-size music companion.

name: JBL Speaker
description: Versatile Bluetooth speaker with clear sound and easy pairing.
longDescription: Enjoy your playlists anywhere. Reliable connectivity and quality audio for everyday listening.

name: Wheels & Tires
description: Durable replacement wheels and tires for your scooter.
longDescription: Ride with confidence—fresh wheels and tires help you maintain traction, comfort, and safety on every trip.

name: Wheels & Tires
description: Heavy-duty wheels and tires for extra durability.
longDescription: A tougher option for rougher surfaces or heavier daily usage—keep your scooter performing at its best.

name: Electric Scooter Pro
description: Balanced performance and comfort for everyday rides.
longDescription: A reliable electric scooter for commuting or leisure. Easy to ride, comfortable and efficient.
